unnormalised: Borem, konnem Delhi NCR-ant laginacho reception korcheak bori zaga kitem mhunn prosn kelo, sori? Borem, *bhai*, hanv tuka sangtam, zageanchi nivodnuk sampurna asa... ani chodd korun motte kimoti, LOL. Poilech, tujea budgettecher dhyan di. Amim "lakhs" vo "crores" banquet hall-ak vichar kortanv? Gambhirtayen! Gurgaon laginchim kaim zaga â‚¹5000 prat plate-ak dakoitat! Mhoji sala? Khanddanchi bhair aslolea "farmhouse" dhache zageancher nodar mar. Tuka khorench bori parking melltolli tea margan ani Sector 18 Noida dhache traffic jam-ant addkun ravchinant!
normalised: Okay, tor konnem Delhi N-C-R-ant eka laginnhachya reception-ak boreo suvatim vixim vicharlem, barem? Vo bhai, mhaka sangtach, vinchnnukank anta na... ani chodd korun kharchik, L-O-L. Poilem mhunnlear, tumcho budget tharava. Ami banquet hall-akhatir lakhs kaim crores vixim uloitat? Gambhirponnan! Gurgaon lagicheo kaim zago rupia panch hazar protiek plate sarkhe charge kortat! Mhozo updesh? Bairamni asloleo farmhouse type suvatim vixim sod. Tumkam khorench boreantolem parking mellonk xakta tenna ani tum Sector eighteen Noida type traffic jam-ant atkun ravchena!

unnormalised: Uprant, tujea patyenche listicher dhyan di. Amim 200 lokank vo 2000-ak vichar kortanv? Kiteak mhunnlear tanchem ek motte vishay asa. Ek soveak "function hall" eka sthanik community center-ant, mhunnche Dwarka Sec-10-ant, ek lhan zomelak ut'tom zatolem, punn ek vhodd punjabi lagink ek porno utpadanachem karkhan. Taka sandun, rutuche vixayicher dhyan di. Jodi laginacho seson (mhunnche Nov-Dec), mhunnlear bhau purvichem book kor. Mhunnche, azunuch. Nimannem meren ravchinaka, vo Vishal Mega Mart GT Karnal Road-cher aslolem addkollichi hall melltolli!
normalised: Uprant, tumchea guest list-achem chintun ghe. Ami don xe zannancher uloitat kaim don hazar zannancher? Kiteak hem khupuch mahatvachem. Eka sthanik community center-antli lhan function hall, mhunnlear, Dwarka S-e-c-ten-ant, lhan pongddak perfect zanvchi asa, punn eka vhoddlya Punjabi laginkhatir purnnponnan nashtem. Toxench, season-acho vichar kor. Zannem laginhancho peak season (November-December sarkho) asa, fuddem book korun ghe. Mhunnlear, atam. Nimannyak meren ravonaka, nam tor tum Vishal Mega Mart-ache voir G-T Karnal Road-ar axelea vegllea hall-ant atkotalim!

unnormalised: Nimannem, ani hanv hea vostunche mahatv sangunk xoktam: ZAGYAK BHET'TT DI. Fattim fatteantlea fottancher nodar maronaka (tem sadach photoshopped asat). Thoim vo, bathroom-ak nodar mar (mahatvachem!), parking, sound system (tem sadach "state of the art" dakoitat, punn...), ani *catering*. Jevnachi ruch gheuncheak pucha! Ani tan-tan korun, mhojea ixtta. Azadpur Mandi-ant bhaji vikri kortalo mhunn tan-tan korun. Tuvem tujea "swapnacho" zago mellcheak subecha. Devi tuji ruprekha (ani traffic) sadach tujea sangatak astoli!
normalised: Xevttak, ani hem hanv bori bhaxen sangonk xakona: suvatik bhett divp. Online-ar axelea chitrank dhyan divn ravonaka (tim sodanch photoshopped astat). Thoinchea thikannar voch, bathrooms-am vixim sod (mahatvachem!), parking, sound system (tim sodanch state of the art mhunta, punn...), ani catering. Jevnnachi ruch gheunk vichar! Ani khub kasrat kor, mhoje ixtta. Azadpur Mandi-nt bhaji vikteam sarke kasrat kor. Tumchi sopnachi suvat mellonk bore bhag. Tumchi kismet (ani traffic) tumchya favour-ant zait!
